cart.emptyMessage: Your cart is empty. Add some products to continue shopping.
cart.emailFreeDescription: Enter the email address to which the item will be sent.
cart.emailPaidDescription: Enter the email address to which the item will be sent after payment. Also, choose the payment system.
cart.stripeDescription: Popular payment system for cards and other methods
cart.paypalDescription: Payment system for cards and PayPal account funds
cart.spectrocoinDescription: Payment system allowing payments with cryptocurrency
cart.noPaymentSystems: NO PAYMENT SYSTEMS AVAILABLE. CONTACT ADMINISTRATOR.
cart.selectPaymentErrorPaid: Please select a payment system for paid items

error.notFoundMessage: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.
error.checkUrl: Try checking the URL for typos, or return to the homepage to browse our products.
error.contactAdmin: Try again in a little while, if the error doesn't go away - contact the administrator.

success.title: PAYMENT SUCCESSFUL!
success.message: Thank you for your purchase. Your order has been processed successfully.
success.redirecting: Redirecting to home page in a few seconds...

cancel.title: PAYMENT CANCELLED
cancel.message: Your payment has been cancelled. You can return to your cart to try again.
